00032 #include "fitshandle.h"
00033 #include "alm.h"
00034 #include "alm_fitsio.h"
00035 #include "powspec.h"
00036 #include "powspec_fitsio.h"
00037 #include "alm_powspec_tools.h"
00038 #include "levels_facilities.h"
00039 
00040 using namespace std;
00041 
00042 int calc_powspec_module (int argc, const char **argv)
00043   {
00044   announce ("calc_powspec");
00045   planck_assert (argc==3||argc==4,
00046     "usage: calc_powspec <almfile1> [<almfile2>] <powspec_file>");
00047 
00048   if (argc==3)
00049     {
00050     int lmax,mmax;
00051     get_almsize(argv[1],lmax,mmax,2);
00052     Alm<xcomplex<float> > alm;
00053     read_Alm_from_fits (argv[1],alm,lmax,mmax,2);
00054     PowSpec powspec;
00055     extract_powspec (alm,powspec);
00056     write_powspec_to_fits (argv[2],powspec,1);
00057     }
00058   else
00059     {
00060     int lmax,mmax;
00061     get_almsize(argv[1],lmax,mmax,2);
00062     Alm<xcomplex<float> > alm1;
00063     read_Alm_from_fits (argv[1],alm1,lmax,mmax,2);
00064     get_almsize(argv[2],lmax,mmax,2);
00065     Alm<xcomplex<float> > alm2;
00066     read_Alm_from_fits (argv[2],alm2,lmax,mmax,2);
00067     PowSpec powspec;
00068     extract_crosspowspec (alm1,alm2,powspec);
00069     write_powspec_to_fits (argv[3],powspec,1);
00070     }
00071 
00072   return 0;
00073   }
